body: Does `kERROR` in TensorRT land mean a fatal error? Can a program still continue with a `kERROR`? You may want to use `LOG(FATAL)` if errors are fatal.
body_html: Does kERROR in TensorRT land mean a fatal error? Can a program still continue with a kERROR? You may want to use LOG(FATAL) if errors are fatal.
body_text: Does kERROR in TensorRT land mean a fatal error? Can a program still continue with a kERROR? You may want to use LOG(FATAL) if errors are fatal.
